name: Artist: ASK | ASK artist's painting style
description:
ASK Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿ASK的作画风格的LoRA模型。

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：共计314张原画（含裁剪图），迭代1256步，多分辨率迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：无。

LoRA model with a painting style imitating ASK.

Recommended weight value: 1 (or ranging from 0.6 to 1.4).

Based on the model: Anything-5RE.

Training information: A total of 314 original paintings (including cropped images) were used for training, with 1,256 iterations using multi-resolution iteration training.

Other suggestions: None.
